Welcome to Stony Creek Prototypes

Stony Creek Prototypes can help you build your models! Leave it to a professional and find out what we do!

Find Out More

We've got what you need!

Stony Creek Prototypes has everything you need to make your model. We specialize with with custom painting and assembly of Class-One fallen flags, modern equipment, rolling stock and locomotives. We like to work with most shortlines & regionals, but love the challegne to work with freelance railroads.

Get Started!

Crafting At Your Service

Hand Painted

Our scale models are hand painted with an eye for percision!

Immesive Research

With most models based on real railroads and engines, we take pride in being as accurate as possbile with our models.

Ready to Ship

We operate via online, so we can reach you via your doorstep!
